mapper.select: SELECT c.*, COALESCE(cl.like_cnt, 0) as like_cnt FROM community c LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_no, COUNT(*) as like_cnt FROM commu_like GROUP BY c_no) cl ON c.c_no = cl.c_no WHERE c.c_no=#{c_no}

SELECT c.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply r WHERE c.c_no = r.c_no) AS reply_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commu_like l WHERE c.c_no = l.c_no) AS like_cnt FROM community c GROUP BY c.c_no, c.nickname, c.title, c.content, c.reg_date, c.view_cnt ORDER BY c.c_no DESC

SELECT c.*, COUNT(r.r_no) AS reply_cnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM community ORDER BY view_cnt DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY ) c LEFT JOIN reply r ON c.c_no = r.c_no GROUP BY c.c_no, c.nickname, c.title, c.content, c.reg_date, c.view_cnt

SELECT c.*, COUNT(r.r_no) AS reply_cnt, cl.like_cnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM community ORDER BY view_cnt DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY ) c LEFT JOIN reply r ON c.c_no = r.c_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c_no, COUNT(l_no) AS like_cnt FROM commu_like GROUP BY c_no ORDER BY like_cnt DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY ) cl ON c.c_no = cl.c_no GROUP BY c.c_no, c.nickname, c.title, c.content, c.reg_date, c.view_cnt, cl.like_cnt
select count(r_no) from community where c_no=#{c_no}
select * from community where nickname=#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by c_no desc

select * from (select ROWNUM as rn, c_no, title, content, reg_date, (select nickname from members where nickname=community.nickname) as nickname from community community where ROWNUM <=(#{cri.pageNum}*#{cri.amount})) where rn >((#{cri.pageNum}-1)*#{cri.amount})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(c_no,nickname, title, content, reg_date) VALUES(seq_c_no.nextval,#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET title=#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE c_no=#{c_no}
